slide1.body: 100% daan labharthiyon tak pahunchta hai. Aavashyak vasthon par pramanit kharch. Paradarshita profile aur seemit payment card ke madhyam se bharosa bana hai.

slide2.body: Donors ko zindagi badalne mein jodta hai. Sthaniya daan sansthao ke sath surakshit bhaagidari zarooratmandon ki zindagi mein spasht farak laati hai.

slide3.body: Donors aur kamzor vyaktiyon ke beech antar ko paar karein. Surakshit profile aur seemit payment cards ke madhyam se seedha prabhav dalein.

Humne aapko ek

registerEmailConfirmation.message: Humne ek link bheja hai jo aapko seedha app par wapas le aayega. Apne phone par apna email zaroor kholein.

donorHome.titleMessage: Aapki udarta bina ghar ke logo ki zindagi mein asli farak la sakti hai.
donorHome.charitySubtitle: Hum sthaniya daan sansthao ke sath aapko zarooratmando se jodne mein madad kar rahe hain.
donorHome.howItWorksContent: Unify Giving aapko daan dene ka shandar anubhav pradan karne ke liye pratibaddh hai.
donorHome.helloMessage: Beghar logo ki madad mein aapke samarthan ke liye dhanyavaad.

donationRecipientsList.instruction: Donate karne ke liye seedha apna phone recipient card par tap karein ya profile chunein.

donationReviewPage.shareMessage: Unify Giving se Namaste. Maine abhi kisi ki madad karne ke liye donate kiya!
donationReviewPage.supportText: Hamare lakshya hai ki labharthi aapke 100% daan praapt karein. Recipient debit card aur RFID wristbands ke kharch ko pura karne ke liye, kirpya daan mein ek vikalpik support shulk jodne par vichar karein.
donationReviewPage.donationSuccessMessage: Aap bahut hi achhe hain, aapne David ko abhi $10 donate kiya aur 30 Unify Credits praapt kiye hain.

donationPaymentMethod.termsAndConditionsText: Is card ko jodne par aap hamare shartein aur niyam se sahmat hain

donationMessages.instructions: Donate karne ke liye seedha apna phone recipient card par tap karein ya profile chunein.

charityUserRecipientUsersList.userGreetingText: Swagat hai wapas, aaj se farak banana shuru karein!

reviewNewRecipient.joinedCharityMsg: Maine 3 saal pehle is charity mein shamil hua tha.

aboutUnifyPage.aboutText: Unify app bina ghar ke vyaktiyon ko surakshit aur prabhavit tareeke se daan praapt karne aur kharch karne mein madad karta hai. Charity partners beghar logo ke liye vishesh profile banate hain aur unhe ek hari Unify RFID wristband aur ek seemit upyog wala Unify bank card dete hain. Donors kisi bhi samay registered vyakti ko daan dene ke liye Unify app khol sakte hain. Agar donor kisi vyakti ko Unify wristband pehne dekhta hai, toh wo smartphone ke madhyam se sidha us vyakti ko daan de sakta hai.

slide1.body: Kuch hi taps ke sath, aap bina ghar ke vyaktiyon par maayne rakhta asar daal sakte hain.

slide2.body: Hamare vishwasniya banking partner surakshit tareeke se donations ko prakriya mein laate hain aur jaldi bina ghar ke vyaktiyon tak pahunchate hain.

slide3.body: Unify cards kewal aavashyak vastuon aur sevaon ki kharidari ke liye hi design kiye gaye hain, jo zimmedarana kharch ko sunishchit karte hain.
